runes.name: Splinters
runes.description: Shoot 3 Poison Darts that deal 60% weapon damage as Poison each.
runes.simpleDescription: Shoot multiple Poison Darts at the same enemy.

runes.name: Numbing Dart
runes.description: Toxins in the Poison Dart reduce the target's movement speed by 60% for 2 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Toxins in the dart Slow the enemy.

runes.name: Spined Dart
runes.description: Gain 24 Mana every time a Poison Dart hits an enemy.
runes.simpleDescription: Gain Mana every time Poison Dart hits an enemy.

runes.name: Flaming Dart
runes.description: Ignite the dart so that it deals 160% weapon damage as Fire at once.
runes.simpleDescription: Ignite the dart so that it deals Fire damage.

runes.name: Snake to the Face
runes.description: Transform your Poison Dart into a snake that has a 30% chance to Stun the enemy for 1.5 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Transform your Poison Dart into a snake that has a chance to Stun the enemy.

skills.name: Poison Dart
skills.description:
Cost: 10 Mana

Shoot a deadly Poison Dart that deals 100% weapon damage as Poison and an additional 40% weapon damage as Poison over 2 seconds.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 10 Mana

Shoot a deadly Poison Dart.

runes.name: Unbreakable Grasp
runes.description: Increases the Slow amount to 80%.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases the amount enemies are slowed.

runes.name: Groping Eels
runes.description: Increases the damage done to 26% weapon damage as Physical.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases the damage of Grasp of the Dead.

runes.name: Death Is Life
runes.description: Enemies who die while in the area of Grasp of the Dead have a 5% chance to produce a health globe.
runes.simpleDescription: Enemies killed by Grasp of the Dead have a chance to produce health globes.

runes.name: Desperate Grasp
runes.description: Reduces the cooldown of Grasp of the Dead to 6 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Reduces the cooldown of Grasp of the Dead.

runes.name: Rain of Corpses
runes.description: Corpses fall from the sky, dealing 80% weapon damage as Physical over 8 seconds to nearby enemies.
runes.simpleDescription: Corpses fall from the sky, damaging enemies they fall on.

skills.name: Grasp of the Dead
skills.description:
Cost: 122 Mana
Cooldown: 8 seconds

Ghoulish hands reach out from the ground, slowing enemy movement by 60% and dealing 20% weapon damage as Physical for 8 seconds.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 122 Mana
Cooldown: 8 seconds

Summon ghoulish hands from the ground that Slow and entangle enemies.

runes.name: Leaping Spiders
runes.description: Summon jumping spiders that leap up to 25 yards to reach their target and attack for 19% weapon damage as Physical.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon jumping spiders to attack your target.

runes.name: Spider Queen
runes.description: You may only have one spider queen summoned at a time.
runes.simpleDescription: You may only have one spider queen summoned at a time.

runes.name: Widowmakers
runes.description: Summon widowmaker spiders that return 3 Mana to you per hit.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon widowmaker spiders that regenerate your Mana each time they attack.

runes.name: Medusa Spiders
runes.description: Summon paralyzing spiders that have a 25% chance to Slow enemies' movement by 60% with every attack.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon paralyzing spiders that have a chance to Slow enemies with every attack.

runes.name: Blazing Spiders
runes.description: Summon fire spiders that deal 21% weapon damage as Fire.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon fire spiders that burn targets.

skills.name: Corpse Spiders
skills.description:
Cost: 5 Mana

Throw a jar with 4 spiders that attack nearby enemies for 16% weapon damage as Physical before dying.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 5 Mana

Throw a jar of Corpse Spiders that attack nearby enemies before dying.

runes.name: Rabid Dogs
runes.description: Your Zombie Dogs gain an infectious bite that deals 9% of your weapon damage as Poison over 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Your Zombie Dogs gain an infectious bite that poisons targets.

runes.name: Final Gift
runes.description: Your Zombie Dogs have a 15% chance to leave behind a health globe when they die.
runes.simpleDescription: Your Zombie Dogs have a chance to leave a health globe when they die.

runes.name: Life Link
runes.description: Your Zombie Dogs absorb 10% of all damage done to you.
runes.simpleDescription: Your Zombie Dogs absorb the damage you take.

runes.name: Burning Dogs
runes.description: Your Zombie Dogs burst into flames, burning nearby enemies for 2% of your weapon damage as Fire.
runes.simpleDescription: Your Zombie Dogs burn nearby enemies.

runes.name: Leeching Beasts
runes.description: Your Zombie Dogs gain 50% of damage they deal as Life, half of which heals you.
runes.simpleDescription: Your Zombie Dogs gain Life as they attack, half of which heals you.

skills.name: Summon Zombie Dogs
skills.description:
Cost: 49 Mana
Cooldown: 60 seconds

Summon 3 Zombie Dogs from the depths to fight by your side. Each dog deals 9% of your weapon damage as Physical per hit.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 49 Mana
Cooldown: 60 seconds

Summon 3 Zombie Dogs to fight by your side.

runes.name: Dire Bats
runes.description: Summon fewer but larger bats that travel up to 40 yards and hit for 220% weapon damage as Fire.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon larger dire bats that travel farther, damaging all enemies in their path.

runes.name: Vampire Bats
runes.description: Gain 2.5% of damage done by the bats as Life.
runes.simpleDescription: Gain Life whenever the bats damage enemies.

runes.name: Plague Bats
runes.description: Diseased bats fly towards the enemy and infect them. Damage is slow at first, but can increase over time to a maximum of 225% weapon damage as Poison.
runes.simpleDescription: Diseased bats fly towards the enemy and infect them.

runes.name: Hungry Bats
runes.description: Rapidly summon bats that seek out nearby enemies for 280% weapon damage as Fire.
runes.simpleDescription: Release bats that seek out nearby enemies and engulf them in flames.

runes.name: Cloud of Bats
runes.description: Call forth a swirl of bats that damage nearby enemies for 195% weapon damage as Fire. The damage of the bats increases by 10% every second, up to a maximum of 50%.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon bats that flock around you, damaging enemies that get too close.

skills.name: Firebats
skills.description:
Cost: 122 Mana

Call forth a swarm of fiery bats to burn enemies in front of you for 150% weapon damage as Fire.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 122 Mana

Call forth a swarm of fiery bats.

runes.name: Phobia
runes.description: Increases the duration horrified enemies run in Fear to 6 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases the duration horrified enemies run in Fear.

runes.name: Stalker
runes.description: Increases movement speed by 20% for 4 seconds after casting Horrify.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases movement speed after casting Horrify.

runes.name: Face of Death
runes.description: Increases the radius of Horrify to 24 yards.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases the radius of Horrify.

runes.name: Frightening Aspect
runes.description: Gain 100% additional Armor for 8 seconds after casting Horrify.
runes.simpleDescription: Gain Armor after casting Horrify.

runes.name: Ruthless Terror
runes.description: Gain 27 Mana for every horrified enemy.
runes.simpleDescription: Gain Mana for every horrified enemy.

skills.name: Horrify
skills.description:
Cost: 37 Mana
Cooldown: 20 seconds

Don a spectral mask that horrifies all enemies within 12 yards, causing them to run in Fear for 4 seconds.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 37 Mana
Cooldown: 20 seconds

Channel the horrors of the Unformed Land and frighten nearby enemies.

runes.name: Swallow Your Soul
runes.description: Gain 39 Mana for every enemy harvested.
runes.simpleDescription: Gain Mana for every enemy harvested.

runes.name: Siphon
runes.description: Gain 2171 Life for every enemy harvested.
runes.simpleDescription: Gain Life for every enemy harvested.

runes.name: Languish
runes.description: Reduces the movement speed of harvested enemies by 60% for 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Reduces the movement speed of harvested enemies.

runes.name: Soul to Waste
runes.description: Increase the duration of Soul Harvest's effect to 60 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase duration of the Soul Harvest effect.

runes.name: Vengeful Spirit
runes.description: Harvested enemies also take 70% weapon damage as Physical.
runes.simpleDescription: Harvested enemies also take damage.

skills.name: Soul Harvest
skills.description:
Cost: 59 Mana
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Feed on the life force of up to 5 enemies within 16 yards. Gain 130 Intelligence for each affected enemy. This effect lasts 30 seconds.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 59 Mana
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Feed on the life force of enemies to increase your Intelligence for 30 seconds.

runes.name: Explosive Toads
runes.description: Mutate to fire bullfrogs that explode for 169% weapon damage as Fire.
runes.simpleDescription: Mutate to fire bullfrogs that explode on impact.

runes.name: Toad of Hugeness
runes.description: Summon a giant toad that swallows enemies whole for up to 5 seconds, digesting for 20% of your weapon damage per second as Physical. Adds a 5 second cooldown to Plague of Toads.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon a giant toad that swallows enemies. Adds a 5 second cooldown.

runes.name: Rain of Toads
runes.description: Cause toads to rain from the sky that deal 130% weapon damage as Poison to enemies in the area over 2 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Cause toads to rain from the sky and poison enemies they strike.

runes.name: Addling Toads
runes.description: Mutate to yellow frogs that deal 130% weapon damage as Poison and have a 15% chance to Confuse affected enemies for 4 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Mutate to yellow frogs that poison and Confuse enemies.

runes.name: Toad Affinity
runes.description: Removes the Mana cost of Plague of Toads.
runes.simpleDescription: Removes the Mana cost of Plague of Toads.

skills.name: Plague of Toads
skills.description:
Cost: 34 Mana

Release a handful of toads that deal 130% weapon damage as Poison to enemies they come in contact with.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 34 Mana

Conjure toads that explode on contact.

runes.name: Consuming Spirit
runes.description: The spirit returns 155 Life per second.
runes.simpleDescription: Gain Life for each Haunt.

runes.name: Resentful Spirit
runes.description: Summon a vengeful spirit that does 0% weapon damage as Arcane over 0 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon a vengeful spirit that ravages its target.

runes.name: Lingering Spirit
runes.description: If there are no targets left, the spirit will linger for up to 10 seconds looking for new enemies.
runes.simpleDescription: If there are no targets for Haunt, the Spirit lingers, looking for new enemies.

runes.name: Grasping Spirit
runes.description: Slow the movement of haunted targets by 30%.
runes.simpleDescription: Slow the movement of haunted targets.

runes.name: Draining Spirit
runes.description: The spirit returns 10.2 Mana per second.
runes.simpleDescription: Haunt regenerates your Mana.

skills.name: Haunt
skills.description:
Cost: 98 Mana

Haunt an enemy with a spirit, dealing 575% weapon damage as Arcane over 12 seconds. If the target dies, the spirit will haunt another nearby enemy.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 98 Mana

Command a spirit to haunt an enemy. If the target dies, the spirit haunts another victim.

An enemy can only be affected by one Haunt at a time.

runes.name: Black Blood
runes.description: Ichor erupts from the corpses of the Zombie Dogs and Slows enemies by 60% for 8 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Ichor erupts from the corpses of the Zombie Dogs and Slows enemies.

runes.name: Next of Kin
runes.description: Each Zombie Dog you sacrifice has a 35% chance to resurrect as a new Zombie Dog.
runes.simpleDescription: Each Zombie Dog you sacrifice has a chance to resurrect as a new Zombie Dog.

runes.name: Pride
runes.description: Regain 294 Mana for each Zombie Dog you sacrifice.
runes.simpleDescription: Regain Mana for each Zombie Dog you sacrifice.

runes.name: For the Master
runes.description: Gain 6202 Life for each Zombie Dog you sacrifice.
runes.simpleDescription: Gain Life for each Zombie Dog you sacrifice.

runes.name: Provoke the Pack
runes.description: Each sacrificed Zombie Dog increases your damage by 5% for 30 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Using Sacrifice increases all damage you deal for 30 seconds.

skills.name: Sacrifice
skills.description: Banish your Zombie Dogs and cause them to explode, each dealing 275% of your weapon damage as Physical to all enemies within 12 yards.
skills.simpleDescription:
Banish your Zombie Dogs, causing them to explode.

Only summoned Zombie Dogs can be sacrificed.

runes.name: Leperous Zombie
runes.description: The Zombie Charger leaves behind a cloud of noxious vapors that deals 25% weapon damage as Poison to enemies caught in it.
runes.simpleDescription: The Zombie Charger leaves behind a cloud that poisons enemies caught in it.

runes.name: Undeath
runes.description: If the Zombie Charger kills any enemies, it will reanimate and charge nearby enemies for 205% weapon damage as Poison. This effect can repeat up to 2 times.
runes.simpleDescription: If the Zombie Charger kills any enemies, it will reanimate and charge again.

runes.name: Wave of Zombies
runes.description: Summon 3 Zombie Chargers that each deal 72% weapon damage as Poison.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon additional Zombie Chargers.

runes.name: Explosive Beast
runes.description: Summon an explosive Zombie Dog that streaks toward your target before exploding, dealing 236% weapon damage as Fire to all enemies within 9 yards.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon an explosive Zombie Dog that streaks toward your target before exploding in a fiery blast.

runes.name: Zombie Bears
runes.description: Summon zombie bears that stampede towards your target. Each bear deals 236% weapon damage as Poison to enemies in the area.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon zombie bears that stampede towards your target.

skills.name: Zombie Charger
skills.description:
Cost: 140 Mana

Call forth a reckless, suicidal zombie that deals 205% weapon damage as Poison to all enemies in its path before decomposing.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 140 Mana

Raise a zombie that charges enemies in its path before decomposing.

runes.name: Jaunt
runes.description: Increases the duration of Spirit Walk to 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases the duration of Spirit Walk.

runes.name: Honored Guest
runes.description: Gain 15% of your maximum Mana every second while Spirit Walk is active.
runes.simpleDescription: Gain Mana while Spirit Walk is active.

runes.name: Umbral Shock
runes.description: When Spirit Walk ends, your physical body erupts for 85% weapon damage as Fire to all enemies within 10 yards.
runes.simpleDescription: When Spirit Walk ends, your physical body erupts into flames and damages nearby enemies.

runes.name: Severance
runes.description: Damage enemies you walk through in spirit form for 100% weapon damage as Physical.
runes.simpleDescription: Damage enemies you walk through while in the spirit realm.

runes.name: Healing Journey
runes.description: Gain 7% of your maximum Life every second while Spirit Walk.
runes.simpleDescription: Gain Life while Spirit Walk is active.

skills.name: Spirit Walk
skills.description:
Cost: 49 Mana
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Leave your physical body and enter the spirit realm for 2 seconds. While in the spirit realm, your movement is unhindered.

Your link to the spirit realm will end if your physical body sustains 50% of your maximum Life in damage.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 49 Mana
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Leave your physical body and enter the spirit realm to move faster.

runes.name: The Spirit Is Willing
runes.description: Gain 44 Mana every time Spirit Barrage hits.
runes.simpleDescription: Gain Mana every time Spirit Barrage hits.

runes.name: Well of Souls
runes.description: An additional 3 spirits seek out other targets and deal 30% weapon damage as Physical.
runes.simpleDescription: Additional spirits seek out and damage nearby enemies.

runes.name: Phantasm
runes.description: Summon a spectre for 5 seconds that deals 45% weapon damage as Physical to all enemies within 10 yards.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon a spectre that deals damage to nearby enemies.

runes.name: Phlebotomize
runes.description: Regain 3% of damage dealt with Spirit Barrage as Life.
runes.simpleDescription: Regain Life when using Spirit Barrage.

runes.name: Manitou
runes.description: Summon a spectre for 20 seconds that hovers over you, unleashing spirit bolts at nearby enemies for 28% weapon damage as Physical.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon a spectre that hovers over you and attacks enemies.

skills.name: Spirit Barrage
skills.description:
Cost: 108 Mana

Bombard a target with a spirit blast that deals 190% weapon damage as Physical.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 108 Mana

Unleash a spirit blast that can travel long distances and over some obstacles.

runes.name: Humongoid
runes.description: The Gargantuan gains the Cleave ability, allowing its attacks to hit multiple targets for 32% of your weapon damage as Physical.
runes.simpleDescription: The Gargantuan gains the Cleave ability, allowing it to attack multiple targets.

runes.name: Restless Giant
runes.description:
20% movement speed
35% attack speed
200% Physical damage

This effect cannot occur more than once every 120 seconds. Elite enemies include champions, rares, bosses, and other players.
runes.simpleDescription: Elite enemies include champions, rares, bosses, and other players.

runes.name: Wrathful Protector
runes.description: Summon a more powerful Gargantuan that only lasts for 15 seconds. The Gargantuan's fists burn with fire, dealing 55% of your weapon damage as Fire and knocking enemies back.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon a more powerful Gargantuan for a shorter amount of time.

runes.name: Big Stinker
runes.description: The Gargantuan is surrounded by a poison cloud that deals 15% weapon damage as Poison per second to nearby enemies.
runes.simpleDescription: The Gargantuan is surrounded by a poison cloud that damages nearby enemies.

runes.name: Bruiser
runes.description: The Gargantuan gains the ability to periodically slam enemies, dealing 100% of your weapon damage as Physical and stunning them for 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: The Gargantuan can Stun enemies.

skills.name: Gargantuan
skills.description:
Cost: 147 Mana
Cooldown: 60 seconds

Summon a Gargantuan zombie to fight for you. The Gargantuan attacks for 25% of your weapon damage as Physical.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 147 Mana
Cooldown: 60 seconds

Summon a Gargantuan zombie to fight for you.

runes.name: Flash Fire
runes.description: Rather than exploding for area damage, each Firebomb can bounce to up to 6 additional targets. Damage is reduced by 15% per bounce.
runes.simpleDescription: Rather than exploding, the skull bounces between multiple targets.

runes.name: Roll the Bones
runes.description: Allows the skull to bounce up to 2 times.
runes.simpleDescription: The skull bounces, dealing damage on every bounce.

runes.name: Fire Pit
runes.description: The explosion creates a pool of fire that deals 8% weapon damage per second as Fire for 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: The explosion creates a pool of fire that lingers for a limited time.

runes.name: Pyrogeist
runes.description: Create a column of flame that spews fire at the closest enemy for 140% weapon damage as Fire over 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Create a column of flame that spews fire at the closest enemy.

runes.name: Ghost Bomb
runes.description: In addition to the base explosion, the skull creates a larger blast that deals an additional 20% weapon damage as Fire to all enemies within 28 yards.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases the skull's impact area with a secondary explosion.

skills.name: Firebomb
skills.description:
Cost: 10 Mana

Lob an explosive skull that deals 85% weapon damage as Fire to all enemies within 8 yards.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 10 Mana

Throw a possessed skull that explodes on impact.

runes.name: Pestilence
runes.description: Locust Swarm has a 100% chance to jump to two additional targets instead of one.
runes.simpleDescription: Locust Swarm has a chance to spread to additional targets.

runes.name: Devouring Swarm
runes.description: Gain 37 Mana for every enemy affected by the swarm.
runes.simpleDescription: Gain Mana for every enemy affected by the swarm.

runes.name: Cloud of Insects
runes.description: Increases the duration of the swarm to 10 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases the duration of the swarm.

runes.name: Diseased Swarm
runes.description: Enemies killed by Locust Swarm leave behind a cloud of locusts that deal 25% weapon damage as Poison. This cloud of locusts lingers for 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Enemies killed by Locust Swarm leave behind a cloud of locusts that attack enemies that enter it.

runes.name: Searing Locusts
runes.description: Engulf the target with burning locusts that deal 468% weapon damage as Fire over 8 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Engulf the target with burning locusts.

skills.name: Locust Swarm
skills.description:
Cost: 196 Mana

Unleash a plague of locusts that swarms an enemy, dealing 360% weapon damage as Poison over 8 seconds. The locusts will jump to additional nearby enemies.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 196 Mana

Unleash a plague of locusts that swarms enemies.

runes.name: Acid Rain
runes.description: Increases the initial area of effect of Acid Cloud to 24 yards.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases the area of effect of Acid Cloud.

runes.name: Lob Blob Bomb
runes.description: The acid on the ground forms into a slime that irradiates nearby enemies for 25% weapon damage as Poison. The slime dissipates after 5 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: The acid on the ground forms into a slime that poisons nearby enemies before dissipating.

runes.name: Slow Burn
runes.description: Increases the duration of the acid pools left behind to 6 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases the duration of the acid pools left behind.

runes.name: Kiss of Death
runes.description: Spit a cloud of acid that inflicts 110% weapon damage as Poison, followed by 82% weapon damage as Poison to enemies who remain in the area.
runes.simpleDescription: Spit a cloud of acid that inflicts Poison damage to enemies who remain in the area.

runes.name: Corpse Bomb
runes.description: Raise a corpse from the ground that explodes for 200% weapon damage as Poison to enemies in the area.
runes.simpleDescription: Raise a corpse from the ground that explodes, damaging enemies in the area.

skills.name: Acid Cloud
skills.description:
Cost: 172 Mana

Cause acid to rain down, dealing an initial 100% weapon damage as Poison, followed by 75% weapon damage as Poison over 3 seconds to enemies who remain in the area.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 172 Mana

Cause acid to rain down and leave pools of poison.

runes.name: Hedge Magic
runes.description: The Fetish Shaman will periodically heal allies for 1861 Life.
runes.simpleDescription: The Fetish Shaman will periodically heal allies.

runes.name: Jinx
runes.description: Hexed targets take 20% additional damage.
runes.simpleDescription: Transformed targets take additional damage.

runes.name: Angry Chicken
runes.description: Transform into an angry chicken for up to 5 seconds that can explode for 215% weapon damage as Physical to all enemies within 12 yards.
runes.simpleDescription: Transform into an angry chicken that can explode.

runes.name: Painful Transformation
runes.description: Hex causes the target to Bleed for 12% weapon damage as Physical.
runes.simpleDescription: Transformed targets Bleed and take damage.

runes.name: Unstable Form
runes.description: Hexed targets explode when killed, dealing 135% weapon damage as Poison to all enemies within 8 yards.
runes.simpleDescription: Transformed targets explode when killed.

skills.name: Hex
skills.description:
Cost: 49 Mana
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Summon a Fetish Shaman for 12 seconds that will hex enemies into chickens. Hexed enemies are unable to perform offensive actions and take 10% additional damage.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 49 Mana
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Summon a Fetish Shaman that transforms enemies into chickens.

runes.name: Unstable Realm
runes.description: Reduces the cooldown of Mass Confusion to 45 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Reduces the cooldown of Mass Confusion.

runes.name: Devolution
runes.description: Enemies killed while Confused have a 50% chance of spawning a Zombie Dog.
runes.simpleDescription: Enemies killed while Confused have a chance of spawning a Zombie Dog.

runes.name: Mass Hysteria
runes.description: Up to 6 enemies who aren't Confused are Stunned for 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Stuns enemies who are not Confused.

runes.name: Paranoia
runes.description: All enemies in the area of Mass Confusion take 20% additional damage for 12 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: All enemies in the area take additional damage.

runes.name: Mass Hallucination
runes.description: Amid the confusion, a giant spirit rampages through enemies, dealing 22% weapon damage per second as Physical to enemies it passes through.
runes.simpleDescription: Amid the confusion, a giant spirit rampages through enemies, dealing damage.

skills.name: Mass Confusion
skills.description:
Cost: 74 Mana
Cooldown: 60 seconds

Incite paranoia in enemies, confusing them and causing some to fight for you for 12 seconds.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 74 Mana
Cooldown: 60 seconds

Confuse enemies and cause them to fight for you.

runes.name: Jungle Drums
runes.description: Increases the duration of the ritual to 30 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases the duration of the ritual.

runes.name: Rain Dance
runes.description: The ritual restores 122 Mana per second while standing in the ritual area.
runes.simpleDescription: The ritual restores Mana.

runes.name: Slam Dance
runes.description: The Fetish increases the damage of all nearby allies by 30%.
runes.simpleDescription: The ritual increases the damage of all nearby allies.

runes.name: Ghost Trance
runes.description: The ritual heals all nearby allies for 5% of their maximum Life per second.
runes.simpleDescription: The ritual heals nearby allies.

runes.name: Boogie Man
runes.description: Enemies who die in the ritual area have a 50% chance to resurrect as a Zombie Dog.
runes.simpleDescription: Enemies who die in the ritual area have a chance to resurrect as a Zombie Dog.

skills.name: Big Bad Voodoo
skills.description:
Cooldown: 120 seconds

Conjure a Fetish that begins a ritual dance that increases the attack speed and movement speed of all nearby allies by 20% for 20 seconds.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 120 seconds

Conjure a Fetish that increases the attack and movement speed of all allies.

runes.name: Barricade
runes.description: Increases the width of the Wall of Zombies. The zombies will attack for 80% weapon damage as Physical.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases the width of the Wall of Zombies.

runes.name: Unrelenting Grip
runes.description: Your Wall of Zombies will Slow the movement of enemies by 60% for 5 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Your wall Slows the movement of enemies.

runes.name: Creepers
runes.description: Up to 3 zombies will emerge from the ground and attack nearby enemies for 25% of your weapon damage as Physical per attack.
runes.simpleDescription: Additional zombie crawlers emerge from the ground and attack nearby enemies.

runes.name: Pile On
runes.description: Summon a tower of zombies that falls over, dealing 765% weapon damage as Physical to any enemies it hits and knocks them back.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon a tower of zombies that falls over and deals damage.

runes.name: Dead Rush
runes.description: Zombies crawl out of the ground and run in all directions, dealing 445% weapon damage as Physical to nearby enemies.
runes.simpleDescription: Zombies crawl out of the the ground and run in all directions, damaging enemies they cross.

skills.name: Wall of Zombies
skills.description:
Cost: 103 Mana
Cooldown: 25 seconds

Raise a line of zombies from the ground that attacks nearby enemies for 80% weapon damage as Physical for 5 seconds.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 103 Mana
Cooldown: 25 seconds

Raise a line of zombies from the ground that attacks nearby enemies.

runes.name: Fetish Ambush
runes.description: Each Fetish deals 250% weapon damage as Physical to any nearby enemy as it is summoned.
runes.simpleDescription: Each Fetish deals additional damage when summoned.

runes.name: Devoted Following
runes.description: Decreases the cooldown of Fetish Army to 90 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Decreases the cooldown of Fetish Army.

runes.name: Legion of Daggers
runes.description: Increases number of dagger-wielding Fetishes summoned by 3.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases number of Fetishes summoned.

runes.name: Tiki Torchers
runes.description: Summon an additional 2 Fetish casters who breathe fire in a cone in front of them that deals 15% of your weapon damage as Fire.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon additional Fetish casters who breathe fire that damages enemies.

runes.name: Head Hunters
runes.description: Summon an additional 2 Hunter Fetishes that shoot blowdarts at enemies, dealing 20% of your weapon damage as Poison.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon additional hunter Fetishes that shoot blowdarts at enemies.

skills.name: Fetish Army
skills.description:
Cooldown: 120 seconds

Summon an army of dagger-wielding Fetishes to fight by your side for 20 seconds. The Fetishes attack for 20% of your weapon damage as Physical.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 120 seconds

Summon an army of dagger-wielding Fetishes.

traits.description: Whenever an enemy dies within 12 yards, there is a 5% chance that a Zombie Dog will automatically emerge. The range of this effect is increased by items that increase your gold pickup radius.
traits.name: Circle of Life
traits.simpleDescription: "The heads hanging in the village had their eyes sewn shut with thick thread. Whatever wicked magic held the frightful hound-beasts together was considerably stronger." —Abner Lockridge

traits.description: Reduces all damage taken by you and your pets by 20%.
traits.name: Jungle Fortitude
traits.simpleDescription: To be one with the jungle is to take what you need and endure what you must.

traits.description:
Maximum Mana is increased by 20%. Regenerate 1% of your maximum Mana per second.

Mana is the fuel you use to cast offensive and defensive skills.
traits.name: Spiritual Attunement
traits.simpleDescription: "The pool is deep and still, cool and silent. Now a fountain, now a whirlpool. Drink and be renewed." —Runic carvings on the Shallow Stone

traits.description: Whenever you are healed by a health globe, you gain 10% of your maximum Mana and 10% Intelligence for 10 seconds. The Intelligence bonus can stack up to 5 times.
traits.name: Gruesome Feast
traits.simpleDescription: "We are all connected in life and in death. Partake of the spirits of the dead and flourish like the jungle that grows wild after the fire." —Shadewalker Zunimassa

traits.description: Whenever you deal Poison damage to an enemy, their damage is reduced by 20% for 3 seconds.
traits.name: Bad Medicine
traits.simpleDescription: "Their mastery of paralytic agents is astounding. The jungle, they say, provides ample demonstration of its wonders." —Abner Lockridge

traits.description: 15% of Mana costs are paid with Life. In addition, you regenerate 1% of your maximum Life per second.
traits.name: Blood Ritual
traits.simpleDescription: "To give of one's self... Is there any greater gift?" —Final words spoken at the Ritual of Blood

traits.description: You can have 4 Zombie Dogs summoned at one time. The health of your Zombie Dogs and Gargantuan is increased by 20%.
traits.name: Zombie Handler
traits.simpleDescription: The dead are willing minions. Death to them is not unknown, therefore need not be feared.

traits.description: All of your damage is increased by 20%, but your Mana costs are increased by 30%.
traits.name: Pierce the Veil
traits.simpleDescription: "The spirits take their toll. Best to be ready to pay." —Shadewalker Zunimassa

traits.description:
Whenever you cast a physical realm spell, you have a 3% chance to summon a dagger-wielding Fetish to fight by your side for 60 seconds.

Physical realm spells are:
Poison Dart
Plague of Toads
Zombie Charger
Corpse Spiders
Firebats
Firebomb
Locust Swarm
Acid Cloud
Wall of Zombies
traits.name: Fetish Sycophants
traits.simpleDescription: The denizens of the Unformed Land are mischievous and drawn to power, always seeking to intrude upon our world, but too fickle to stay for long.

traits.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Horrify, Spirit Walk, and Soul Harvest spells by 2 seconds. In addition, the next time you receive fatal damage, you automatically enter the spirit realm for 3 seconds and heal to 10% of your maximum Life. This effect cannot occur more than once every 90 seconds.
traits.name: Spirit Vessel
traits.simpleDescription: Everyone dies. Sometimes we must return to finish what we started.

traits.description:
Spirit spells return 30% of their Mana cost over 10 seconds.

Spirit spells are:
Haunt
Horrify
Mass Confusion
Soul Harvest
Spirit Barrage
Spirit Walk
traits.name: Rush of Essence
traits.simpleDescription: All spirits must move onward if they wish to return to their origins. There is no going back.

traits.description: Any time you have 4 or more skills on cooldown, your Mana regeneration is increased by 300%.
traits.name: Vision Quest
traits.simpleDescription: "You sense but do not see. Walk beside yourself in the Unformed Land. Walk until you find yourself again, or wander lost forever." —Chant of Ordeal

traits.description: All your pets get 100% of the benefit of your Thorns and Life regeneration items.
traits.name: Fierce Loyalty

traits.description: Whenever an enemy dies within 8 yards, regain 1% of your maximum Life and Mana and the cooldown on all of your abilities is reduced by 1 second. This range is extended by items that increase your gold pickup radius.
traits.name: Grave Injustice
traits.simpleDescription: Only a fool tries to cheat death. The wise offer a fair trade.

traits.description: The cooldowns of your Fetish Army, Big Bad Voodoo, and Hex abilities are reduced by 25%.
traits.name: Tribal Rites
traits.simpleDescription: "Befriend those who come from the Unformed Land, and they will befriend you." —Zuwadza of the Tribe of the Five Hills
